channel.title: No I really dont need 20 defence to weild arrows
channel.description:
Ok people have noticed on my server that you need 20 defence to weild rune arrows (Id: 892) I searched for 892 in client.java and nothing to do with skilllvl 20 came up
does anyone know how I can change the lvl back to 1?

item.title: No I really dont need 20 defence to weild arrows
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

What the fuck!

I basically said the exact same thing, work it out yourself you pathetic little nerd. Expecting everyone to do everything for you. This is so basic, you’ve been at Moparscape long enough to work something this easy out. Gtfo.

Read full topic

item.title: No I really dont need 20 defence to weild arrows
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

type ctrl + f and type public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {. scroll down until you see //It’s a weapon, weapons don’t required defence ! 2 lines above that type || ItemName2.startsWith(“arrow”) then it is fixed
